A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a fairly good sequel that genuinely surprised me. I didn't think it would be as Good as it was. It is a mess of a movie\, but still fun. It had some great action scenes\, sets\, and some hilarious moments. It's not what I expected of a Star Wars movie\, and I think that's a good thing. It allows for a refreshing chapter in a beloved saga. I will definitely see this again.A great sequel to The Force Awakens.
